channel.title: Megaclaw - Somewhere else
channel.description:
Megaclaw - Somewhere else https://soundcloud.com/knls1978/megaclaw-somewhere-else-1
Recreation of my old track “Trip” This Took me one day.
Please like and follow me on Soundcloud. (Follow back to all Auxy users) https://soundcloud.com/knls1978
Feedbacks will be appreciated.

item.title: Megaclaw - Somewhere else
item.dc:creator: Polar
item.description:
I love this! Great work! So catchy, clean, smooth. Nothing wrong with this song. Volumes are perfect, everything is so great. All I got to say is the clicks in the second “drop” are a little loud. Other than that, crisp!

Read full topic

item.title: Megaclaw - Somewhere else
item.dc:creator: darwinmcd
item.description:
Cool. Really like what you did with Panda (one of my favorite/go-to bass sounds).

Read full topic

item.title: Megaclaw - Somewhere else
item.dc:creator: Megaclaw
item.description:
Panda for bass and Canoe for the melody with some lowpass automation.
Only few instruments used to keep it simple…
